title: Audit a Supplier's Facility
description: A quality manager needs to audit a new supplier's manufacturing facility to ensure it meets quality standards before they can be approved.

tasks.description: Use a standard checklist to audit the supplier's quality management system (QMS), production processes, and documentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent completes the full audit checklist.

tasks.description: Document any non-conformances or areas for improvement found during the audit.
Generate an audit report and provide it to the supplier. If non-conformances were found, require a corrective action plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the report and requests a corrective action plan from the supplier.
